title: You’re Fired! Atlanta Radio Host Let Go For Airing False Donald Trump Interview
text:
Published By: Media Ite - Today 
Steve McCoy, the NewsRadio 106.7 radio host in Atlanta, has been fired for doctoring and passing off an old Donald Trump interview as a new ...
